```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pagedown)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, out.width="70%", fig.align='center')

```

# Introduction

This report presents the results of a genome-wide association study (GWAS) analysis.

run this in terminal in the resutys folder first:

```
for file in *.pdf; do     convert "${file}" "${file%.pdf}.png"; done
```

# GWAS Results

The filtered GWAS results are provided in the following CSV file:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
gwas_results <- read.csv("GAPIT.Association.Filter_GWAS_results.csv")
knitr::kable(gwas_results[,-1])
```
